title: Enhancing Business Strategy Practical Competencies: Mobile Microlearning for Digital Fluency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and comprehension of digital tools
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners collect and analyze ≥5 business/HR datasets from ≥3 digital platforms (e.g., Google Analytics, LinkedIn Talent Insights, HRIS) during a mid-term course (2–4 weeks) and submit a 3-page APA-formatted analysis report.
Learners can operationalize collaborative and creative problem-solving strategies using digital tools.
Learners can explain critical evaluation and ethical utilization strategies for digital content.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
